input.sentences: a biker jumps triumphantly at a biking event .
a photographer looks on | photographing the bikers .
the bikers round a curve while a photographer captures the action .
a biker seems almost to pose as he speeds gracefully down a ramp .
this biker speeds up at the end | causing him to win .
output.sentences: The competitor takes a wooden jump eagerly to the cheering of the crowd.
Journalist and photographers tune out the sounds, looking for that best shot, the best story.
Another photographer catches an excitign photo of a competitor rounding a wooden turnpike and almost parallel to the gound.
Picking up speed, competitors head down the hillside, avoiding stairs where they can.
The cobble of the streets serves to make turns more hazardous, but these pros aare well prepared.
